name: Untitled Tactical Strategy Audio Mixing Game
name_original: Untitled Tactical Strategy Audio Mixing Game
description: Work in progress. Control an acoustic bass fighting to purify noise ridden drums and keyboards. HP bars currently do not change colors to reflect team affinity, so it gets very confusing very quickly. Additionally, something is wrong with how the particle effects are emitting, as they always default back to full emission when a unit switches sides.
